children.value: is available as part of the QIIME 2 moshpit distribution. For installation and usage instructions please consult the official

This QIIME 2 plugin contains actions used to assemble (meta)genomes from short single/paired-end
sequencing reads:
Evaluate quality of the assembled contigs using metaQUAST.
Filter contigs by length and/or metadata.
Map reads to contigs/MAGs using Bowtie 2.

code style. To make the development slightly easier
there are a couple of pre-commit hooks included here that will ensure that your changes
follow that formatting style. Before you start working on the code, please
install the hooks by executing

in your conda environment. From then on,
they will be run automatically every time you commit any changes.
